mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.product_no, a.product_name, a.product_price, a.discount, a.product_size, a.product_color,a.main_image, b.user_no, b.wish_no FROM PRODUCT AS A JOIN WISHLIST AS B ON A.product_no=B.product_no WHERE a.product_no=#{product_no} AND b.user_no=#{user_no} ) AS SUB RIGHT JOIN PRODUCT_CONTENT_DETAIL AS D ON SUB.product_no=D.product_no WHERE SUB.product_no=#{product_no}

SELECT a.product_no, a.review_no, a.product_name, a.user_no, a.product_size, a.star, ROUND(AVG(star) OVER (PARTITION BY a.product_no),1)AS avgstar, a.review_title, a.review_content, a.user_id, a.review_time, a.product_color, b.review_no, b.photo1, b.photo2, b.photo3, b.photo4, b.photo5 FROM review AS A LEFT JOIN review_photo AS B ON (a.review_no = b.review_no) WHERE a.product_no=#{product} LIMIT #{perPageNum} OFFSET #{startRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE PRODUCT_NO=#{product}
